subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Before his ninth-inning hit in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ Robinson Cano was 0 for 29 in his last plate appearances.
snippet: Before his ninth-inning hit in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S., the Yankees’ Robinson Cano was 0 for 29 in his last plate appearances.
